text: Ānāpānassati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti
edit: Ānāpānassati bhikkhave bhāvitā bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti

translations.transtext: Monks, the mindfulness of breathing, [when] having been cultivated and practiced frequently, fulfills the four foundations of mindfulness.
